page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{EMPLOYMENT In 1922 there were police,2 blacksmiths,2 shops and many more people.Then there was alot of employment in Glass but now the main employment comes from the farms.There are only a few people who are unemployed in Glass. {QUESTIONS Q.What sort of employment is there in Glass? A.Nothing except the farms and Prep school. Q.Where is the main centre of employment from here? A.Aberdeen. Q.What is the average wage of a farm labourer? A.It conforms with Goverment minimum standards.
Though a few of those who have cars are employed in towns round about.
